WordPress User Roles Comparison

Capability Subscriber Contributor Author Editor
Edit Posts No Yes (own) Yes (own) Yes (any)
Delete Posts No Yes (own, unpublished) Yes (own) Yes (any)
Publish Posts No No Yes (own) Yes (any)
Upload Files No No Yes Yes
Edit Published Posts No No Yes (own) Yes (any)
Delete Published Posts No No Yes (own) Yes (any)
Edit Others' Posts No No No Yes
Delete Others' Posts No No No Yes
Manage Categories No No No Yes
Moderate Comments No No No Yes
Manage Links No No No Yes
